document.heading: Capitol Hill Business Improvement District Amendment Act of 2013

history.narrative: Law 20-33, the “Capitol Hill Business Improvement District Amendment Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-92. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 26, 2013, and July 10, 2013, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 31, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 20-136 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-33 became effective on October 17, 2013.
